entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
